articles.author: Mat Di Salvo
articles.title: Bitcoin Cools and Drops Below $30,000—But XRP, Chainlink Surging - Decrypt
articles.description: Bitcoin has again dropped below $30,000 per coin. But these altcoins are surging.
articles.content:
Bitcoin's run may be cooling offthe largest digital asset is now below $30,000 per coinbut a number of altcoins are soaring.
Just weeks ago, the biggest and oldest cryptocurrency soared above $31,00… [+1777 chars]
